f( 2x2, 3x3 ) image, kernel 

( 2 + 3 ) - 2 = number of points = 3

1st stage = generation of 1000 points sets, evaluated at #|100| image set accuracy
2nd stage = results sorted
3rd stage = re-eval top 100 results with 5k image set
